name: Level Six Slate 3mm Neoprene Sock with Kevlar Sole - Unisex
categories: Slate 3mm Neoprene Sock with Kevlar Sole
description: Thick neoprene holds in body heat when you're paddling in the cold. Durable soles add  longevity when you can't wear a watershoe or sandal.Stretch 3mm neoprene.Liquid sealed seams and a nylon facing add comfort.Armortex sole with Kevlar resists abrasion when walking on land.
